name: Small tray of Kufta Bil Bandoora
description: A juicy and rich in flavors layer of minced Meat mixture covered with slices of potato and tomato cooked with tomato sauce in a pot. Served with bread. Preparation time: 30 minutes.

name: Big tray of Kufta Bil Bandoora
description: A juicy and rich in flavors layer of minced Meat mixture covered with slices of potato and tomato cooked with tomato sauce in a pot. Served with bread. Preparation time: 30 minutes.

name: Small tray of Kufta Bil Thine
description: A juicy and rich in flavors layer of minced Meat mixture covered with slices of potato and cooked in thick tahini sauce in a pot. Sprinkled with golden brown pine nuts, to reach the best of its taste. Served with bread. Preparation time: 30 minutes.

name: Big tray of Kufta Bil Thine
description: A juicy and rich in flavors layer of minced Meat mixture covered with slices of potato and cooked in thick tahini sauce in a pot. Sprinkled with golden brown pine nuts, to reach the best of its taste. Served with bread. Preparation time: 30 minutes.

name: Small tray of Dajaj Mhamar
description: If you want to try any true palestinian dish, you should order this roasted Chicken and potato tray, cooked with olive oil and sumac. Served with bread. Preparation time: 45 minutes.

name: Big tray of Dajaj Mhamar
description: If you want to try any true palestinian dish, you should order this roasted Chicken and potato tray, cooked with olive oil and sumac. Served with bread. Preparation time: 45 minutes.

name: Msakhan
description: Two freshly baked thin crust bread pitas covered with a layer of onion, cooked in olive oil and sumac, topped with half Chicken. Best lunch for cold winter days.

name: Chiken Pot
description: If you are up to eat something exotic and new - order the Chicken pot. Half Chicken cooked with potato and bell pepper in olive oil and spices. Preparation time: 45 minutes.
